title: GET_PLAYER_NAME
content:
0x6D0DE6A7B5DA71F80x406B4B20// GetPlayerName
char* GET_PLAYER_NAME(Player player);Parameters:player: The player index, or -1 to get the local player ped.Returns: The name of the queried player. "Invalid" if the player does not exist.Returns the players name from a specified player index
